definition: fastener that fastens together two ends of a belt or strap, to bend out of shape, as under pressure or from heat
details:
noun
- fastener that fastens together two ends of a belt or strap
- a shape distorted by twisting or folding
= synonyms: warp
verb
- to bend out of shape, as under pressure or from heat
= example: to bend out of shape, as under pressure or from heat
= synonyms: heave
- to fold or collapse
= example: to fold or collapse
= synonyms: crumple
- to fasten with a buckle or buckles
= example: to fasten with a buckle or buckles
= synonyms: clasp
